Module c195.v6pa
Package org.example.v4pa.helper

Class AppointmentFinder

java.lang.Object
org.example.v4pa.helper.AppointmentFinder
public abstract class AppointmentFinder extends Object
This class creates the AppointmentFinder class that finds Appointment-related information based on different parameters.

  • Method Details

    • findAppointmentsByContact

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> findAppointmentsByContact(int contactID)
      This method finds all appointments associated with a specific contactID. LAMBDA - The lambda allows the user to determine if there are any appointments associated with the contact ID.
      Parameters:
      contactID - the ID used to determine if a contact has associated appointments.

    • findAppointmentsByUser

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> findAppointmentsByUser(int userID)
      This method finds an appointment associated with a specific userID.
      Parameters:
      userID - the ID used to find the appointment object.

    • findAppointmentsByCustomer

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> findAppointmentsByCustomer(int customerID)
      This method finds an appointment associated with a specific customerID.
      Parameters:
      customerID - the ID used to find the appointment object.

    • findUpcomingAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> findUpcomingAppointments(LocalDateTime currentDateTime, int userID)
      This method finds an appointment associated with a specific userID that will start within 15 minutes of the user's current time.
      Parameters:
      userID - the ID used to find the appointment object.
      currentDateTime - the current date and time to compare against the appointment objects.

    • findWeeklyAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> findWeeklyAppointments(LocalDateTime currentDateTime)
      This method finds any appointments that will start within 7 days of the user's current date and time.
      Parameters:
      currentDateTime - the current date and time to compare against the appointment objects.

    • findMonthlyAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> findMonthlyAppointments(LocalDateTime currentDateTime)
      This method finds any appointments that will start within 1 month of the user's current date and time.
      Parameters:
      currentDateTime - the current date and time to compare against the appointment objects.
